name: Validate Fix
description: Validate fix with tests, coverage, and performance checks

movements.name: Validate Fix
movements.description: Run validation checks on generated fix

beats.title: Validation Requested
acceptanceCriteria:
Given the validateRequested operation is triggered
When the handler executes
Then it completes successfully within < 500ms
And the output is valid and meets schema
And any required events are published

Given valid input parameters
When validateRequested processes them
Then results conform to expected schema
And no errors are thrown
And telemetry events are recorded with latency metrics

Given error conditions
When validateRequested encounters an error
Then the error is logged with full context
And appropriate recovery is attempted
And the system remains stable

Given performance SLA of < 500ms
When validateRequested executes
Then latency is consistently within target
And throughput meets baseline requirements
And resource usage stays within bounds

Given compliance and governance
When validateRequested operates
Then all governance rules are enforced
And audit trails capture execution
And no compliance violations occur
beats.userStory: As an operations system, I want validateRequested to execute reliably with latency < 500ms so that dependent services meet their SLA targets (goal: 99.9% success rate).

beats.title: Run Tests
beats.description: Run all tests on patched code
beats.scenario: Execute Test Suite and Report Results
acceptanceCriteria:
Given a test suite for the project
When runTests is invoked
Then all tests are executed
And results are collected and reported
And failed tests are identified with failure reason

Given 1000+ unit tests
When runTests processes them
Then tests execute in parallel (sharded across cores)
And total execution time is < 10 minutes
And all tests complete (none skipped)

Given test failure
When runTests encounters failure
Then failure reason is reported with assertion details
And stack trace is captured
And build halts (fail fast)
And developer gets clear guidance on fix

Given test coverage requirement (80%)
When runTests completes
Then code coverage is measured
And coverage report is generated
And build fails if coverage < target

Given flaky test detection
When same test fails intermittently
Then test is marked as flaky
And developer is notified
And flaky test is retried or investigated
beats.userStory: As a QA system, I want test execution to complete in <10 minutes so that developers get rapid feedback on code quality (target: 80% of test suites run < 5 min).
